trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control is used as a container for other controls, especially when controls are generated programmatically.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controle é usado como um contêiner para outros controles, especialmente quando os controles são gerados por meio de programação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control is parsed, and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, a marcação de código-fonte que descreve o associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistido no código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The PanelContainerDesigner class provides design-time support for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controls in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: A classe PanelContainerDesigner fornece suporte de tempo de design para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controles em um designer visual.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A> property gets the caption that appears on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A>propriedade obtém a legenda exibida no associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A> property gets the styles of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A>propriedade obtém os estilos do controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>propriedade sempre retorna `true`, indicando que o designer cria uma cópia temporária do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A>método prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> method sets collection elements to the string representations of various style attributes of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A>método define elementos da coleção de representações de cadeia de caracteres de vários atributos de estilo do controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control or a copy of that control on the visual designer surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controle ou uma cópia desse controle na superfície de design visual.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Adds string representations of style attributes to a collection to be used in the design-time rendering of the control.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona as representações de cadeia de caracteres de atributos de estilo para uma coleção a ser usada no processamento de tempo de design do controle.

trans-unit.source: The AddDesignTimeCssAttributes method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> base method, which adds string representations of style attributes to the `styleAttributes` collection.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método AddDesignTimeCssAttributes o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>base do método, que adiciona representações de cadeia de caracteres de atributos de estilo para o `styleAttributes` coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These attributes are based on the style properties of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: Esses atributos são com base nas propriedades de estilo de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The AddDesignTimeCssAttributes sets the direction of `styleAttribute` to a code indicating left-to-right or right-to-left, based on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.Direction%2A> property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O AddDesignTimeCssAttributes define a direção do `styleAttribute` para um código que indica a esquerda para a direita ou da direita para esquerda, com base no valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.Direction%2A>propriedade do controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.Direction%2A>

trans-unit.source: A collection of style attributes implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de atributos de estilo implementando <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets the caption that appears on the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a legenda exibida no associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The FrameCaption property returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.GroupingText%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade retorna FrameCaption o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.GroupingText%2A>propriedade associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.GroupingText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the panel caption.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a legenda do painel.

trans-unit.source: Gets the styles of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os estilos de associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A> property is an empty string (""), the FrameStyle property returns an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A>propriedade é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), a propriedade FrameStyle retorna vazio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner.FrameCaption%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the FrameStyle property returns a default <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that is generated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.FrameStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> base property.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, a propriedade FrameStyle retorna um padrão <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objeto que é gerado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.FrameStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>base propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.FrameStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object that contains the design-time styles for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> objeto que contém os estilos de tempo de design para o associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The visual designer calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: O designer visual chama o método Initialize quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para processar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: A inicialização e seus métodos base configurar propriedades e configurar eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controle associado este designer ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref>, which implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref>, que implementa um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: component is not a or of a class derived from .
trans-unit.target: componentnão é um ou de uma classe derivada de .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer deve usar uma cópia temporária em vez do controle real que está associado com o designer para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Because the UsePreviewControl property is always `true`, the designer uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that contains a copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Porque a propriedade UsePreviewControl é sempre `true`, o designer usa um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle que contém uma cópia do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controle para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control does not affect any persistence for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle não afeta qualquer persistência para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: If the UsePreviewControl property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade UsePreviewControl foi substituída para retornar `false`, o designer usará associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>para gerar a marcação de tempo de design e alterações em tempo de design para o controle será mantido para a origem de marcação da página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
